title: 求助，用了军团要塞mod后出现崩溃
author: otbot699
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 14-10-6 下午8:27
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: de.pitman87.TF2Sentry.common.TF2SentryMod

replies.author: otbot699
replies.txt_content:
我去，怎么一大段没了，简单点说就是mod冲突，然后我就去找id，结果没找到冲突的地方
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 2%E8%A6%81%E5%A1%9E
这是mod的地址
